III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4158
Section Intervention standards and prohibitions
Description (1) A child caring institution shall establish and follow written
policies and procedures that prohibit the following forms of
intervention:
(a) Any type of physical punishment including, but not limited to:
(iv) Verbal abuse including the use of derogatory or
discriminatory language including negative references to a youth's
1

background or appearance or mental state. Yelling, threats,
ridicule, or humiliation are strictly prohibited.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation Manager cusses at Youth A.
Investigation Interview:
Youth A was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on 6/5/2025.
Youth A reported Manager swears at him and has sworn at him
more than once when telling him to stop doing something. Youth A
reported that other people are around when it happens but could
not remember who. Youth A could not remember what Manager
said to him specifically. Youth A did not provide any additional
information.
Manager was interviewed face-to-face at the facility on 6/12/2025.
Manager denied swearing at Youth A at any time. Manager denied
using any inappropriate language or raising his voice to Youth A
or any other youth at the facility. Manager denied witnessing any
other staff swearing or using any inappropriate language with
Youth A or any other youth.
Youth B, Youth C, Staff 1, and Supervisor were interviewed
face-to-face at the facility on 6/24/2025. All parties denied
witnessing or hearing that Manager swore or used inappropriate
language with Youth A or any other youth at the facility. All parties
denied hearing any other staff use inappropriate language or
curse words with Youth A.
Documentation Review:
• Training and Disciplinary documentation regarding
Manager includes 1 disciplinary incident report unrelated to
addressing youth. Training Hours include 64.5 hours in
2024 including Handle with Care verbal/physical
intervention and 41 hours in 2025.
• Code of Ethics Policy 3.1 states that staff may not verbally
abuse youth.
Analysis There is no evidence to support Manager cursing at Youth A.
Conclusion Violation Not Established
